name: Clean up Championship
description:
⚠ Some bugs are in Html version download the game to get the real made ⚠

Sorry for that I will upload a seconds version

"The clean up world Champion" 

 I know you're dying to participate, but stay calm,  let me just the time to present my game. Like the title say, you will participate in a clean up championship. The aim of the game is to optimize space taken by the furnitures in a limited time, so, move them, stack them and made THEM EXPLODE!! Oopsii... I said too much. 

This game has been made for Ludum Dare 42, if you participated I hope all went well and I hope you will take a little pleasure with my game.
